Module group75
Package model

Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
model.SoundManager
public class SoundManager extends Object
This class manages the sound in the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static SoundManager
    getInstance()
    Returns the singleton instance of the SoundManager.
    void
    playClickSound()
    Play the click sound effect.
    void
    playCollectSound()
    Plays the collect sound effect.
    void
    playGameTheme()
    Plays the game theme music on a continuous loop.
    void
    playMainTheme()
    Plays the main theme music on a continuous loop.
    void
    stopGameTheme()
    Stops the game theme music if it is currently playing.
    void
    stopMainTheme()
    Stops playing the main theme music if it is currently playing.
